subtitle: About Me!
content: I'm a Software Engineer, I finished my studies on Engineering at the Technical University of Cluj-Napoca. During my career I worked with a wide variety of technologies - both frontend and backend. I was constantly interested in learning more things. Also staying up to date with the latest technologies & trends. I'm always keeping an eye on open source. I think I add value to projects through my ability to resolve complex tasks while having the business side of things in mind - trying to solve real-world problems.
